website_summaries.verdict: Keep the party going into the night with this glow-in-the dark lawn dart set.
pros: Simple game that all ages can play
Weighted darts made with rubbery materials to prevent injuries
Great for play on grass or on the beach
cons: The rings ship rolled, so laying them flat can be difficult
Darts may bounce once they reach the target

customer_reviews.title: fun game
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the old fashioned lawn darts game that I was raised on but it is just as challenging if it is played on a lawn. The "darts" are not darts at all but weighted missiles that have a tendency to bounce out of the target area so you need to really aim well and develop the correct technique for success. The pieces seem to be well made and they are safer to use around small children and pets than the old styled darts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUMMER FUN AND FRUSTRATION
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my young grandsons for outdoor play. Weighted darts are well constructed. Object of game is simple enough for younger kids to enjoy. Keep an eye on the kids, the darts can become a weapon if you get hit with one. The only negative are the target circles. They are plastic tubing folded and stuffed into the tote bag. The kinks will not come out to make a circular hoop to aim at and will not lay flat on the lawn. There goes the fun of the game. I'm going to buy 2 Hula hoops and give that a try.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap. Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s a kids game but the thing is not very well-made at all. The rings are extremely thin plastic and don’t lay flat because they’ve been rolled up in the box for so long. The darts themselves seem OK but I could see several opportunities for them to break because of how they’re made
customer_reviews.author: Preston G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice construction...the fact that the rings glow in the dark too is a plus...And they contacted me to be sure I was happy. That's good customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Geosnoopy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible I’m afraid. The FIRST set I ordered broke after the second time using them. They came apart when they hit the ground and cannot be out back together to stay. I ordered. SECOND set and they broke as well after just one use. I would like to contact the seller for a refund. It is a fun game but you cannot play it.
customer_reviews.author: LMN

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be a ok set. The rings are pretty cheap and really won’t lay flat after being wound up tight for packaging purposes. The darts are good and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: These are great fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always looking for fun things to do with the family at home. These really fit the bill! I love the colorful Ness of the darts!! They actually glow in the dark which is so cool because you can use them when the sun is going down and even pass that if you want, before the mosquitoes come out. I like the sturdiness of them and they really work great and their loads of fun. They are a gift to Bob because they come in a really nice box and a really a nice and thoughtful gift for anyone who has some space to use them. They really are great fun!!
customer_reviews.author: SLTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great game for my sons
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. My sons (11 and 3) look forward to playing with it together outside. Great delivery time and customer service! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been hours of fun for my family and I! Love that it glows in the dark
customer_reviews.text: This yard game has been so much fun for my family and I this summer. It’s a great game to play outside in the evening when it starts to cool down. It’s a fun night game as it glows in the dark. Unlike the older version of lawn darts this lawn dart game is safe as the darts are rounded so no one will get struck by a sharp end. The darts are weighted so that they “stick” to the ground once thrown. It’s durable and been hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Nice outside game
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 11 year old grandson for Christmas. He went almost immediately outside to play with them. It was nice to see him go outside and play rather than sit inside on an electronic device.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Good game for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for the family to play outdoors. While it was fun, they gravitated to other home made games. The rings were flimsy and we had a hard time getting them flat in a circle. The actual darts were well made but will not hold up on cement surfaces or if thrown hard by adult children! All in all, it is a good game but some aspects could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: FatMilkDud

customer_reviews.title: Darts are weighted enough but....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for a lawn game with my adult kids. Made sure that it sat in the sun all day because we intended to use at night aka glow in the dark game. Comes in a storage bag which is really helpful. Unfortunately, was never bright enough to use at night, so don't expect a glowing result. Rings need to be sturdier and less flexible and of course brighter fora night time game. This might need to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: TLowryBest

customer_reviews.title: All ages can play!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy that I found this game for our family.....I wish the darts had a little less "bounce" to them. Often if the dart lands in the circle, it bounces out..our family is very competitive so we established that a dart inside the hoop counts even if it bounces out. Peaceful solution! Fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great lawn fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: Great lawn fun for hours. This is a fun outdoor game for the yard for kids of all ages. The adults have a blast playing this too. Can play with two players or 10 players. Easy to follow instructions. Easy fast pick up and set up. Easy to store when not in use. Great for grass concrete sand driveway or anywhere. We mostly play in our front yard. Fun for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Love my deals

customer_reviews.title: I like that glows in the dark
customer_reviews.text: This lawn darts that is a nice upgrade from the slightly more dangerous versions we used to use as kids over 20 years ago, but this set is fun because it glows in the dark so it’s fun to use in low light and the light situations. Has a nice carrying case to store everything together and it’s fun for anyone of any age or ability to play in the yard with.
customer_reviews.author: Wanpaku

customer_reviews.title: Family fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a similar set years ago when my kids were much younger. At the urging of one of my sons, now 20 years old, I bought this set. It seems well made. We have used it a few times and it is bringing back great memories. Read some reviews about the scoring rings, be sure and twist at the splice point to get them to lay flat. They are not perfectly round, but they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: HAMMERHEAD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: About the 5th throw, the flight piece broke apart on landing. VERY cheaply made!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this item is not what I expected for the price I paid. Very cheaply made like something you would expect to find in a Five Below or Dollar General store. Definitely not worth the price. I feel like I’ve been swindled. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ShoNoMrc

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: The kids are having a great time with these. They appear to be durable and much safer than the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh - They just don't work well
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a fun family game while we are stuck at home during COVID-19. The weighted darts are ok,but they bounce (a lot) making it very hard to aim. The "targets" are just bendable plastic rings that don't stay put on the lawn at all. I would recommend paying a little more and getting a better quality set.
customer_reviews.author: LM Gaydos

customer_reviews.title: Broken dart within the first 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: My kids were stoked to receive something they could actually enjoying playing, outdoors, during this lock down. Although the item arrived well packaged and as described, one of the 4 darts snapped in half within 30 minutes of playing with this set. The game was setup in our front yard wish 4 inch bermuda grass. When the dart bounced upon landing, the tail end snapped off completely. This happened where the screw attaches to the flight. For $30+/- I truly expected the game to last at least a few days before falling apart. I would not recommend this unless the seller/distributor would be willing to replace the broken dart. Statesville, NC USA
customer_reviews.author: Sean K.

customer_reviews.title: The rings were very flimsy and would not stay in a circle. We returned it.
customer_reviews.text: The actual "darts" seemed fine and sturdy. However, the hoops that are used for the targets were VERY flimsy. They would not lay in a nice circle even after I had them out for a few days and worked with them to try to get them to lay flat and in a nice circle. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: BWW

customer_reviews.title: broke during first usage. Product is made to be tossed thru air to the ground. snapped in halh
customer_reviews.text: broke of first usage. definitely not worth the money we spent. would appreciate a refund, or other suitable reward
customer_reviews.author: william f. minett jr.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay. I miss the originals from my childhood.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that target hoops are hard to lie flat. I get that is due to the packaging constraints, but it is frustrating when setting up the game. I wish they still made the original lawn darts, but these will have to do as an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Torgerson

customer_reviews.title: Half the Fun
customer_reviews.text: The darts are very durable and sturdy but the hoops are cheap and flimsy. The glow doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Macdoodle

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to use on soft surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The first time my kids took these out and used them one of the “fins” broke. After using we read that it is supposed to be used on soft surfaces. We didn’t have anything soft so haven’t really used since we know they will break more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: the idea of a safe dart without a point is just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: WE LIKED EVERYTHING ABOUT THEM. THE KIDS HAD SO MUCH FUN WITH THEM! tHANKS AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Barry

customer_reviews.title: Changed since 1970!
customer_reviews.text: Not the game I played as a child with the pointed tips. These are weighted plastic ones. They are a little harder to get in the circle without bouncing out. But the grandsons had a great time playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It.
customer_reviews.text: These bounce around too much. If you get a bullseye it can bounce out of the circle. The plastic circle that comes with it does not lay flat or resemble a circle. Fortunately it’s not expensive but really not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Seery

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun & easy to play for all ages. I really like the glow-in-the-dark aspect. The only downside is that the rings are a little flimsy. One has already kinked in one spot. It's fine now, but hope it won't effect the way it lays going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun without the sharp darts.
customer_reviews.text: I run a summer program for children and this has been a great addition. The glow in the dark circles were difficult to see on the grass so I painted white circles on the grass and this has worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Have only played a couple times, but the target rings unfolds and stays mostly in place, darts seem sturdy. Haven't played in the dark, but did see the dart bottom glowing. Looking forward to playing a lot more this summer.
customer_reviews.author: MCKress

customer_reviews.title: Overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The rings are the most flimsy part, as they are supposed to fold up. The darts are sturdy and have held up well. The entire game is stored in a little black bag and could be gifted.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Much safer than the old style darts kids really enjoyed them
customer_reviews.author: Kennith C Clay Jr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.  Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. They broke in first 5 min of use.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Harris

customer_reviews.title: Lawn darts
customer_reviews.text: Great game for the backyard or camping. I take this anywhere that my kids might get bored. Cones in a nice bag and this is a game for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Look for the old game
customer_reviews.text: Not like. The old game!! Thendarts bounce when they land, you could be dead center of the ring; it will bounce Out of the ring.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Did not like these at all. Nothing like the old ones. The heads are weighted down which you would think would be a good thing but when it lands on the ground, it rolls where it wants to. Would have returned if my husband had not thrown the packaging away.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Guffey

customer_reviews.title: We love this
customer_reviews.text: The kids have already had hours of fun with this! Between this product, ladder ball and the badmitton, we have had days worth of backyard fun during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Resch

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: We played with this for 20 minutes before one of the "darts" broke. Do NOT waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: cheap, not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this product and extremely disappointed given it is cheaply made and certainly not worth the price. I feel at the most this item should cost half the price. crap quality. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Campanaro

customer_reviews.title: The battery type should be AAA‘s instead of the small little disks
customer_reviews.text: The Game set itself was very nice great gift works great glows in the dark only drawback I saw was the little batteries that need to be replaced at times they are the round little disks instead of AAA’s are that great product
customer_reviews.author: Steve Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic tips crack easily.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you’re a pro, one wrong bounce & the cheap plastic ends crack & break easily. Just being thrown in the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Stef L

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It's very durable, easy to play, and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL GIBAS

customer_reviews.title: Great for ages 4-9
customer_reviews.text: Darts can be played out doors, and even glow in the dark. Both gifts delighted the kids. The overall rating is based on a 4 year old and a nine year old. They were' good at judging sturdiness or durability but both were a real hit.
customer_reviews.author: Londonlin

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Really like this set. Everything is stored together in a nice zip up bag. Really enjoy the game and the quality it brings
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Great game and made really well. Good for all ages and I would highly recommend. Only issue was the zipper on storage bag is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Rice

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: 10 min and a dart snapped in two. I want my money back or replace the dart please
customer_reviews.author: Christine E Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this set. The darts seem better made than any others that I have looked at.
customer_reviews.author: pmb

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight, brightly colored lawn darts
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter’s birthday, while the lawn darts appear to be of great quality ( she hasn’t used them yet) the carry bag was not. The zipper tab came apart immediately & I was unable to repair it but luckily I had a much sturdier bag that will serve the purpose. This was disappointing & happened at the last minute so there was no time to return. It all worked out in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Terry, PA

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: This product is certainly safe for kids. My only drawback is the darts tend to bounce when they hit the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Podczervinski

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: First time we used it one of the darts broke. I glued it back together with gorilla glue. Use them for the second time today. The one I glued broke on the first toss then a few tosses later a second one broke. When the third broke I threw them in the garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Christian

customer_reviews.title: Nice for beach
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to have no matter your age, easy to play. Glows helps you plan when sun goes down!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: The darts will bounce on certain types of terrain making it harder to get in circles, however, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: TKOduo

customer_reviews.title: Darts anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect game to pack away for the beach, camping, picnic, or at home use. Glow in the dark works well.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Fun outdoor game!
customer_reviews.text: These look so fun. Love the glow in the dark feature! I bought this for my soon to be 12 year old grandson. He will love them!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: A hit at our Labor Day
customer_reviews.text: The Lawn Darts game was a real success at my Labor Day party. These are completely safe, easy to use and very affordable. I highly recommend it for out door fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G. Brimhall

customer_reviews.title: Fun for families
customer_reviews.text: Had them as a kid and now my whole family loves them
customer_reviews.author: Toledo Bend Fan

customer_reviews.title: Came as described but difficult for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandsons . The idea of it is nice but the rings don’t flatten out well. They bounce out too so was frustrating for the kids
customer_reviews.author: laurie adler

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction!
customer_reviews.text: These lasted about 10-15 minutes of use. The shafts came apart from the weighted end.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey Mike

customer_reviews.title: Kids had fun
customer_reviews.text: Had fun in the sand dunes. Did not glow as much as thought but the kids had fun
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lantieri

customer_reviews.title: Not a feasible buy for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Our Granddaughters, 7 and 9, enjoyed the game. We used it 3 times, about an hour each time. Two of the bottom weights fell off. One plastic feather broke off. It is now unusable. I would like a refund. Priced way too high.
customer_reviews.author: Louisville JR

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for all
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Tk school party. They loved it and so did the parents. Very sturdy. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: misty greek

customer_reviews.title: Fits the purpose
customer_reviews.text: It did its purpose but was a little chintzy for the money, I honestly could have gotten the same quality for a lesser price
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Future fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for an upcoming teen activity. It looks like plenty of fun! I am looking forward to introducing this game. I love the fact this game arrived 2 days earlier than expected! Kudos for that!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not built well.
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun, HOWEVER this product did not hold up. Our darts started to break after two or three uses.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J.

customer_reviews.title: broke 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: After having fun playing the first day we got it, took it out to play on day two. First throw, on grass, and the lawn dart broke. And in a way that is not reparable. Very disappointed. If they break that easily, should come with an extra for each color.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great game to play in the yard.
customer_reviews.text: The lawn darts are so much safer than the speared darts. You still have to take safety in consideration with children, but with proper adult supervision this is a load of fun.
customer_reviews.author: F. Stellino

customer_reviews.title: Good for large areas to play on. Darts were strong!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the weight of the darts! They travel quite far. I did not like the targets, they were a bit too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Om

customer_reviews.title: Really good yard game.
customer_reviews.text: My two grandsons (13 and 7) love this game. They play it in the yard. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: I bought These for my grandchildren because I had Jarts aa a kid and loved the game. They got these lawn darts and played all afternoon. They worked so well I bought Some for their house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool just the green loops are a pain to keep them as a flat circle. They keep wanting to lift wired off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun family friendly, portable game.
customer_reviews.text: We love this game, heavy darts, easy to play and carry. We have taken to the lake, backyard, neighbors and camping. This game works with adults and kids, even grandchildren love to play.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on day 1
customer_reviews.text: These are a great idea, and fun for the kids, until they fall apart. Going to try and Gorilla Glue them back together and see if I can get some more use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson for Christmas so he can put it in his camper when they're camping. He was so excited. He had his dad go outside and play right away.
customer_reviews.author: colleen yattow

customer_reviews.title: Good for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport and set up. Good for all ages. Not sure how long it will hold up, but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: carol johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good but found similar ones for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: this is a good product, kids loved playing with it. But it is a little on the expensive side, i was able to find similar products which were cheaper on some other sites.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cheap, 2 darts broke on first throw
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Mother’s Day gift and two of the darts broke upon first use (First throw for each). Used on a grass area like recommended. Was not able to return during time frame due to Covid19 and drop off centers closed early/closed completely. Now stuck with a broken set. Do not recommend buying. Pay a little more for a better quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bmegs

customer_reviews.title: Over priced!
customer_reviews.text: Family party no one liked how they worked! Waste of money. Date to return expired. It happy
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Hauglie

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun with the kid's. I see why they stopped using the pointed one's lol
customer_reviews.author: Dan Benick

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift. Seems well built and includes a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Rob skinner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality--AND it gets the pre-teens outside!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how heavy (in a good way) the lawn darts were and my 12 year old boy has been playing them with friends since he's received them...it was my way to help get them off the video games--and, so far, it has worked! Best part, according to my son, is that they light up in the dark so they can play outside in the yard past 8 pm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We played for hours, I like that it has a storage bag when you are done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it..
customer_reviews.text: I realized kids nowadays don’t play outside much so I went on a mission to buy outdoor games. This was a big hit at the Mother’s Day picnic. The kids from age 3 to the adults absolutely had a blast!! Can’t wait to play again
customer_reviews.author: Mykeva

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Darts looked durable, but target rings are flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: grandkids enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: nice safer version of Jarts.. The grandkids played and no one got hurt :) good fun game for campouts & grandma's house
customer_reviews.author: norma t miller

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to my nephew and everyone loved them at the party!
customer_reviews.author: daisy2147

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: We got this product today and my two boys were so excited to have something to do outside to pass the quarantine time. On the second toss one of the darts snapped in half. They were so upset and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I was very much looking forward to playing the game we played as kids. The package itself was very small . The glow in the dark rings are flimsy like the old jelly bracelets. They don’t even lay flat or hold the circle shape. For the price paid for this item I expected better quality.. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for my grandchildren. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard game
customer_reviews.text: Darts are great, circles are somewhat flimsy, but it is a terrific backyard game
customer_reviews.author: Lesli  Jean Preuss

customer_reviews.title: They bounce right out of the target
customer_reviews.text: The lawn darts seem to be a decent quality and the carry case is nice, but you just can't play the game. Unlike the lawn darts of my childhood with the metal tips, these just hit the ground and bounce/flop right out of the circle. It is impossible to play the game because of this. These were a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: Half way though our first family game the plastic fletching broke off on one dart. The rings nor the darts glow in the dark even after sitting in the bright sun for hours. I would not suggest this parody and I will not purchase nor seek a replacement product. Chalk it up to an expensive moment of family time.
customer_reviews.author: arryane mcpipkin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I like that the rings blow in the dark although they are a little flimsy. The darts themselves are solid.
customer_reviews.author: njmezzoni

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them twice, good product so far. Good outdoor entertainment .
customer_reviews.author: Jabee

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Game was great, loved the glow in the dark feature but the rings were a bit flimsy and took some time to reshape, Could’ve made the rings with a stronger plastic. Did not want to put the rings back in the travel bag because I wanted them to keep their round shape.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product two stars because we were having great fun with it. Unfortunately, each of the darts have decided to break. The screw in the shaft that holds the base to the handle breaks off when you throw the dart. We have tried to fix them but it didn’t work. Disappointed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Lawn darts game
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and has been a good game for for the backyard with some get togethers. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: T and M

customer_reviews.title: OUTDOOR GAME
customer_reviews.text: We used it for entertainment on Easter Sunday. Kids and adults enjoyed playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Sticker

customer_reviews.title: Great for the entire family.
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. Anyone can play and it’s a great family game. Love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Beaman Gray

product_meta.title: Lawn Darts Game – Glow in The Dark, Outdoor Backyard Toy for Kids & Adults | Fun for The Entire Family | Work On Your Aim & Accuracy While Having A Blast
feature_bullets: A GAME FOR YOU & YOUR KIDS: Spend some quality with your children, go outside and play a game of darts! There’s no better way to improve your aim and have a blast at the same time.
TIPS THAT GLOW IN THE DARK: As long as there is a light on the dart tips, they will glow in the dark, making them perfect for a late-night game of darts with your family!

HAVE A DOSE OF OUTDOORSY FUN: Perfect for the beach, the lawn or your backyard, these glow-in-the-dark darts are perfect for all soft surfaces but not so much for harder surfaces since they would bounce.
EXCELLENT CRAFTSMANSHIP: Our darts are made with rubbery soft, plastic materials that are durable enough to last you for years to come! Make a game out of them and see who gets the highest score!
LOVE THEM OR YOUR MONEY BACK: Make our lawn dart game yours today and if you or your children are not fascinated with it, let us know and we’ll send your money back!
